title: Stretches for Spasticity With Multiple Sclerosis (Easy to do and Guided!!)
description:
Want More Free Exercises for Your Symptoms?
Sign up for the FREE ONLINE MS WORKOUTS STRENGTH CAMP 
www.msworkouts.com/strengthcamp

Learn More About Our Guided Exercise Designed for MS
http://bit.ly/2vJf6CI

10% OFF COUPON to our Online Exercise Program for MS 
http://bit.ly/2j0D06Z

FREE E-PROGRESS JOURNAL AND LESSON VIDEO
http://bit.ly/2w4kaNo

SUBSCRIBE!
http://bit.ly/2eHXpfs

—————————————————————————————

Our YouTube Channel is designed for people living with Multiple Sclerosis to have access to guided exercise videos. Whether you are newly diagnosed or wheelchair bound, our channel has a safe and effective exercise for you. 

In this week's weekly exercise video Jeff will execute two stretches that lengthen the muscles in the lower back. If you are experiencing pain from spasticity due to Multiple Sclerosis, try these stretches a few times a week! 

STRETCHES PERFORMED IN THIS VIDEO

1.) Hip Cross Over - 0:52

2.) Hip Rotation - 3:00

—————————————————————————————



GUIDED EXERCISES FOR MULTIPLE SCLEROSIS

channelDescription: This channel provides you with strength training exercises designed to help you improve your strength, mobility and reduce your symptoms safely and effectively with our Steadypace® technique. Visit www.msworkouts.com for our full exercise program.
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/kExSekvX4UI" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: This is great! I prayed about getting back up to walking and found a link to this site. It covered everything I needed to move away from the wheelchair and walker. Thanks so much for this :)

I got diagnosed with MS at the end of 2023. I did Martial Arts for over 7 years and was extremely flexible. After I quit Martial Arts my flexibility vanished basically over night and my ability to walk started faultering soon after. I need to stretch because my hips, knees and ankles feel so tight constantly.
This is my 3rd journey to walk again I'm so happy I found you guys

OMG. I have been doing this for the past few days, and my hips are feeling like they're brand new. Such a simple fix.
Thank you so much,
Dale D'Aiuto
Yeah, I haven't instantly felt the need to stretch before this moment. My T2 and I thank you.
